sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Montrose Environmental Group (NYSE:MEG Investor Three-year Losses Grow to 59% as the Stock Sheds US$144m This Past Week
feed.summary: Montrose Environmental Group (NYSE:MEG) shareholders have experienced significant losses, with the stock down 59% over the past three years and 20% in the last three months, including a 16% drop this past week. Despite these share price declines, the company has shown decent revenue growth of 14% per year over the same three-year period. Insiders have also made significant purchases, suggesting potential value, but further investigation into the divergence between revenue growth and share price performance is warranted.

Analyst ratings on Optex Systems currently maintain a "Hold" consensus, following recent downgrades, and insider sales totaling over $1.5 million have been reported in the last 90 days.

feed.title: Verizon's Outage Outraged Over 1 Million Customers. Why I Just Bought the Stock Anyway.
feed.summary: Despite a recent service outage affecting over a million customers, the author purchased Verizon stock, citing unchanged long-term growth prospects, an attractive dividend, and an upcoming acquisition of Frontier Communications. The article argues that the outage's financial impact will be temporary, similar to a past AT&T incident, and has made Verizon's stock valuation even more appealing. The author intends to buy more shares if no further service issues arise.

feed.title: 3M Earnings On Deck – What To Expect (NYSE:MMM)
feed.summary: 3M (NYSE: MMM) is set to report its fourth-quarter 2025 earnings before market open on Tuesday, January 20, 2026. The company's performance for the quarter will be closely watched, particularly concerning its ability to sustain margin expansion, as management had previously raised full-year adjusted EPS guidance twice. While analysts forecast $2.07 EPS and $6.25B revenue, the stock's reaction will heavily depend on the 2026 guidance provided, which needs to confirm continued operating leverage amidst end-market softness.
